body:
Support rendering to multiple windows/screens.

Use cases:

- combining multiple screens into a virtual larger one
- rendering a greenscreen background of your cockpit (or whatever is behind you) for webcam picture-in-picture while streaming
- using a pen display (or tablet?) for vehicle control panels etc. (in-game on-screen menus)
- the old macbook touch bar
- stream deck
title: multi-window rendering (& input?)
